top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Let's name the in home barista
Bertta the barista
Fridge tour! Fridge tour! Fridge tour!
Beautiful!! Hopefully there’s plans for a pool fence - especially with a toddler running around! It’s my worst nightmare not having a fence around a pool incase of an accident
ooh where are those heels and dresses in the glam room from? they're so cute and I want to buy them!
Call the coffee maker Joesephine. Because it makes a cup of joe!
I just keep saying OH MY GOD
she reminds me of DJ fuller 🥺🥺
shes come so far its incredible! so happy for your successes in life Ro!
You should call your barista Latte
i think you should add one of those sliding ladders that u see in a library and it will look soooooo cute and it will make your house more fun too!!

Hey Ro, I have been following you on a journey for quite some time, I have been a nerdy nummy since apartment box cakes! I am so proud of how far you have made it❤️ your house is gorgeous! And I think you should name the barista Barbra!❤️☕️
